Translations.Text: abasya'i saphalakama hayeche [1] muminagana
yara tadera salate bhita-abanata
ara yara asara karmakanda theke thake bimukha
ebam yara yakate sakriya
ara yara nijedera yaunangake rakhe sanraksita
nijedera stri ba adhikarabhukta dasigana chara, ete tara habe na nindita
atahpara ke'u ederake chara an'yake kamana karale, tara'i habe simalanghanakari
ara yara raksa kare nijedera amanata [1] o pratisruti
ara yara nijedera salate thake yatnabana
tara'i habe adhikari
yara adhikari habe phirada'usera [1], yate tara habe sthayi
Ara abasya'i amara manusake srsti karechi matira upadana theke
tarapara amara take sukrabindurupe sthapana kari eka nirapada bhandare

Pare amara sukrabinduke parinata kari ‘alaka-te, atahpara ‘alaka-ke parinata kari gosatapinde, atahpara gosatapindake parinata kari asthite; atahpara asthike dheke de'i gosata diye; tarapara take gare tuli an'ya eka srstirupe [1]. Ata'eba, (dekhe nina) sarbottama srasta [2] allah‌ kata barakatamaya
erapara tomara niscaya marabe
tarapara keyamatera dina niscaya tomaderake ut'thita kara habe
Ara abasya'i amara tomadera urdhbe srsti karechi satati asamana [1] ebam amara srsti bisaye mote'i udasina na'i
ara amara akasa theke pani barsana kari parimitabhabe [1]; atahpara amara ta matite sanraksita kari; ara abasya'i amara ta niye yete'o sampurna saksama
Tarapara amara ta diye tomadera jan'ya khejura o angurera bagana srsti kari; ete tomadera jan'ya ache pracura phala; ara ta theke tomara kheye thaka
ara srsti kari eka gacha ya janmaya sina'i parbate, ete utpanna haya taila ebam yara khaya tadera jan'ya khabara tatha tarakari

Ara tomadera jan'ya abasya'i siksaniya bisaya ache catuspada jantuguloya; tomaderake amara pana kara'i tadera pete ya ache ta theke ebam tate tomadera jan'ya rayeche pracura upakarita; ara tomara ta theke kha'o
ara tate o nauyane tomadera bahana'o kara haye thake

Ara abasya'i amara nuhake pathiyechilama tara sampradayera kache [1]. Tini balalena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara allah‌ra ‘ibadata kara, tini chara tomadera an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i, tabu'o ki tomara taka'oya abalambana karabe na [2]?’

Atahpara tara sampradayera netara, yara kuphari karechila [1], tara balala, ‘e to tomadera mata ekajana manusa'i, se tomadera upara sresthatba labha karate cacche, ara allah‌ icche karale pheresata'i nayila karatena; amara to amadera purbapurusadera kale erupa ghateche bale sunini
‘E to emana loka yake unmadana peye baseche; kaje'i tomara era samparke kichukala apeksa kara.’
Nuha balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amake sahayya karuna, karana tara amara prati mithyaropa kareche [1].’

Tarapara amara tara kache ohi pathalama, ‘apani amadera caksusa tattbabadhana o amadera ohi anuyayi nauyana nirmana karuna, tarapara yakhana amadera adesa asabe ebam ununa [1] uthale uthabe, takhana uthiye nebena pratyeka jibera eka eka jora ebam apanara paribara-parijanake, taderake chara yadera birud'dhe age sid'dhanta hayeche. Ara tadera samparke apani amake kichu balabena na yara yuluma kareche. Tara to nimajjita habe
Atahpara yakhana apani o apanara sangira nauyanera upare sthira habena takhana baluna, ‘samasta prasansa allah‌ra'i, yini amaderake ud'dhara karechena yalema sampradaya theke.’
Aro baluna, ‘he amara raba! Amake namiye dina kalyanakarabhabe; ara apani'i srestha abataranakari.’
Ete abasya'i rayeche bahu nidarsana [1]. Ara amara to taderake pariksa karechilama
Tarapara amara tadera pare an'ya eka prajanma [1] srsti karechilama

erapara amara tadera'i ekajanake tadera kache rasula kare pathiyechilama! Tini balechilena, ‘tomara allah‌ra ‘ibadata kara, tini chara tomadera an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i [1], tabu'o ki tomara taka'oya abalambana karabe na?’

Ara tara sampradayera netara, yara kuphari karechila o akheratera saksate mithyaropa karechila ebam yaderake amara diyechilama duniyara jibanera pracura bhoga-sambhara [1], tara balechila, ‘e to tomadera'i mata ekajana manusa; tomara ya kha'o, se ta-i khaya ebam tomara ya pana kara se'o ta'i pana kare
‘yadi tomara tomadera'i mata ekajana manusera anugatya kara tabe tomara abasya'i ksatigrastha habe
‘Se ki tomaderake e pratisruti'i deya ye, tomadera mrtyu hale ebam tomara mati o asthite parinata hale'o tomaderake bera kara habe
‘asambhaba, tomaderake ye bisaya pratisruti deya hayeche ta asambhaba
‘Ekamatra duniyara jibana'i amadera jibana, amara mari bamci ekhane'i. Ara amara punarut'thita ha'oyara na'i
‘Se to emana byakti ye allah‌ sambandhe mithya apabada dicche, amara to take bisbasa karara na'i.’
Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake sahayya karuna; karana tara amara prati mithyaropa kareche.’
Allah‌ balalena, ‘acire'i tara anutapta habe.’
Tarapara eka birata a'oyaja satya-n'yayera sathe [1] taderake pakara'o karala, phale amara taderake taranga-tarita abarjanara mata [2] kare dilama. Kaje'i yalema sampradayera jan'ya ra'ila dhbansa
Tarapara tadera pare amara bahu prajanma srsti karechi
Kono jati'i tara nirdharita kalake tbaranbita karate pare na, bilambita'o karate pare na

Erapara amara ekera para eka amadera rasulaganake prerana karechi. Yakhana'i kono jatira kache tara rasula esechena takhana'i tara tara prati mithyaropa kareche. Atahpara amara tadera ekera para ekake dhbansa kare taderake kahinira bisaya kare diyechi. Kaje'i yara imana ane na se samasta sampradayera jan'ya dhbansa'i ra'ila
tarapara amara amadera nidarsanasamuha ebam suspasta pramanasaha musa o tara bha'i harunake pathalama
phira‘a'una o tara parisadabargera kache. Kintu tara ahankara karala; ara tara chila ud'dhata sampradaya
Atahpara tara balala, ‘amara ki emana du’byaktite bisbasa sthapana karaba yara amadera'i mata, athaca tadera sampradaya amadera dasatbakari [1]?’
Sutaram tara tadera ubhayera prati mithyaropa karala, phale tara dhbansapraptadera antarbhukta hala
Ara amara to musake diyechilama kitaba; yate tara hedayeta paya
Ara amara mara'iyama-putra o tara jananike karechilama eka nidarsana ebam taderake asraya diyechilama eka abasthanayogya o prasrabanabisista ucca bhumite
‘He rasulagana [1]! Apanara pabitra bastu theke khadya grahana karuna ebam satkaja karuna [2]; niscaya apanara ya karena se samparke ami sabisesa abagata
Ara apanadera e um'mata to eka'i um'mata [1] ebam ami'i apanadera raba; ata'eba amara'i taka'oya abalambana karuna [2].’
Atahpara lokera tadera nijedera madhye tadera e bisaya tatha dinake bahudha bibhakta kareche [1]. Pratyeka dala'i tadera kache ya ache ta niye anandita
Kaje'i kichu kalera jan'ya taderake sbiya bibhrantite chere dina
Tara ki mane kare ye, amara taderake ye dhana-sampada o santana-santati dbara sahayogita karechi, tara madhyame
tadera jan'ya sakala mangala tbaranbita karachi? Na, tara upalad'dhi kare na
Niscaya yara tadera rabera bhaye santrasta
ara yara tadera rabera nidarsanabalite imana ane
ara yara tadera rabera sathe sirka kare na
ara yara ya deyara ta deya [1] bhita-kampita hrdaye, ejan'ya ye tara tadera rabera kache pratyabartanakari
Tara'i druta sampadana kare kalyanakara kaja ebam tara tate agragami haya
Ara amara ka'uke'o tara sadhyera besi dayitba de'i na. Ara amadera kache ache emana eka kitaba [1] ya satya byakta kare ebam tadera prati yuluma kara habe na
Baram e bisaya tadera antara ajnanataya acchanna, echara'o tadera aro kaja ache ya tara karache
Sesa paryanta yakhana amara tadera bilasi [1] byaktiderake sasti dbara pakara'o kari takhana'i tara artanada kare uthe
Taderake bala habe, ‘aja artanada karo na, tomaderake to amadera paksa theke sahayya kara habe na.’
Amara ayata to tomadera kache tila'oyata kara hata [1], kintu tomara ulto paye pichane sare parate
Dambhabhare e bisaye arthahina galpa-gujabe [1] rata matiye [2] tomara kharapa katha balate
Tabe ki tara e banite cinta-gabesana kareni [1]? Naki e jan'ye ye, tadera kache emana kichu eseche ya tadera purbapurusadera kache aseni
naki tara tadera rasulake cine na bale take asbikara karache
naki tara bale ye, tini unmadanagrasta? [1] Na, tini tadera kache satya enechena, ara tadera adhikansa'i satyake apachandakari

Ara hakka yadi tadera kamana-basanara anugami hata tabe bisrnkhala haye parata asamanasamuha o yamina ebam egulote ya kichu ache sabakichu'i [1]. Baram amara tadera kache niye esechi tadera ijjata o sam'mana sambalita yikara [2] kintu tara tadera e yikara (kura'ana) theke mukha phiriye neya
Naki apani tadera ache kono pratidana cana? [1] Apanara rabera pratidana'i to srestha ebam tini'i srestha riyikadata
Ara apani to taderake sarala pathera dike'i ahbana karachena
Ara niscaya yara akherate imana rakhe na, tara sarala patha theke bicyuta
ara yadi amara taderake daya kari ebam tadera duhkha-dain'ya dura kari tabu'o tara abadhyataya bibhrantera n'yaya ghurate thakabe
Ara abasya'i amara taderake sasti dbara pakara'o karalama, tarapara'o tara tadera rabera prati binata hala na ebam katara prarthana'o karala na
Abasese yakhana amara tadera upara kathina kono sastira duyara khule deba takhana'i tara ete asahata haye parabe
Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya kana, cokha o antakarana srsti karechena; tomara khuba alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kare thaka
Ara tini'i tomaderake yamine bistrta karechena [1] ebam tomaderake tamra'i kache ekatra kara habe
Ara tini'i jibita karena ebam mrtyu dena ara tamra'i adhikare rata o dinera paribartana [1]. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhabe na
baram tara bale, yemana balechila purbabartira
Tara bale, ‘amadera mrtyu ghatale ebam amara mati o asthite parinata hale'o ki amara punarut'thita haba
amaderake to e bisaye'i pratisruti pradana kara hayeche ebam atite amadera purbapurusaderake'o. Eta to purbabartidera upakatha chara ara kichu'i naya.’
Baluna, ‘yamine ebam ete ya kichu ache egulo(ra malikana) kara? Yadi tomara jana (tabe bala).’
Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌ra.’ Baluna, ‘tabu'o ki tomara siksa grahana karabe na?’
Baluna, ‘sata asamana o maha-‘arasera raba ke?’
Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌.’ Baluna, ‘tabu'o ki tomara taka'oya abalambana karabe na?’
Baluna, ‘kara hate samasta bastura kartrtba? Yini asraya pradana karena athaca tamra bipakse ke'u ka'uke asraya dite pare na [1], yadi tomara jana (tabe bala).’
Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌.’ Baluna, ‘tahale kotha theke tomara jadukrta haccho?’
Baram amara to tadera kache haka niye esechi; ara niscaya tara mithyabadi

Allah‌ kono santana grahana karenani ebam tamra sathe an'ya kono ilaha'o ne'i; yadi thakata tabe pratyeka ilaha sbiya srsti niye prthaka haye yeta ebam eke an'yera upara pradhan'ya bistara karata [1]. Tara ye gune take gunanbita kare ta theke allah‌ kata pabitra- mahana
tini gayeba o upasthitera jnani, sutaram tara ya kichu sarika kare tini tara urdhbe
Baluna, ‘he amara raba! Ye bisaye taderake pratisruti pradana kara hacche, apani yadi ta amake dekhate cana
tabe, he amara raba! Apani amake yalema sampradayera antarbhukta karabena na [1].’
Ara amara taderake ye bisaye pratisruti pradana karachi, amara ta apanake dekhate abasya'i saksama
Mandera mukabila karuna ya uttama ta dbara; tara (amake) ye gune gunanbita kare amara se sambandhe sabisesa abagata
Ara baluna, ‘he amara raba! Ami apanara asraya prarthana kari sayatanera prarocana theke [1].’
‘Ara he amara raba! Ami apanara asraya prarthana kari amara kache tadera upasthiti theke.’
Abasese yakhana tadera karo mrtyu ase, se bale, ‘he amara raba! Amake abara pherata pathana
‘yate ami satkaja karate pari ya ami age karini [1].’ Na, eta ha'oyara naya. Eta to tara ekati bakya matra ya se balabe'i [2]. Tadera samane bar‌yakha [3] thakabe ut'thana dina paryanta
Atahpara yedina singaya phumka deya habe [1] sedina parasparera madhye atmiyatara bandhana thakabe na [2] ebam eke an'yera khomja-khabara nebe na
atahpara yadera palla bhari habe tara'i habe saphalakama
ara yadera palla halaka habe, tara'i nijedera ksati kareche; tara jahanname sthayi habe
Aguna tadera mukhamandala dagdha karabe ebam tara sekhane thakabe bibhatsa ceharaya
tomadera kache ki amara ayatasamuha tila'oyata kara hata na? Tarapara tomara sesabe mithyaropa karate
Tara balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Durbhagya amaderake peye basechila ebam amara chilama eka pathabhrasta sampradaya
‘he amadera raba! E aguna theke amaderake bera karuna; tarapara amara yadi punaraya kuphari kari, tabe to amara abasya'i yalima haba.’
Allah‌ balabena, ‘tomara hina abasthaya ekhane'i thaka ebam amara sathe kono katha balabe na
Amara bandaganera madhye ekadala chila yara balata, ‘he amadera raba! Amara imana enechi ata'eba apani amaderake ksama karuna o daya karuna, ara apani to sarbasrestha dayalu.’
‘Kintu taderake niye tomara eto thatta-bidrupa karate ye, ta tomaderake bhuliye diyechila amara smarana. Ara tomara tadera niye hasi-thatta'i karate.’
‘Niscaya ami aja taderake tadera dhairyera karane emanabhabe puraskrta karalama ye, tara'i hala saphalakama.’
Allah‌ balabena, ‘tomara yamine kata bachara abasthana karechile?’
Tara balabe, ‘amara abasthana karechilama ekadina ba dinera kichu ansa; sutaram apani gananakariderake jijnesa karuna.’
Tini balabena, ‘tomara alpa kala'i abasthana karechile, yadi tomara janate
‘tomara ki mane karechile ye, amara tomaderake anarthaka srsti karechi ebam tomaderake amadera kache phiriye ana habe na?’
Sutaram allah‌ mahimanbita, prakrta malika, tini chara kono hakka ilaha ne'i; tini sam'manita ‘arasera raba
Ara ye byakti allah‌ra sathe an'ya ilahake dake, e bisaye tara nikata kono pramana ne'i; tara hisaba to tara rabera nikata'i ache; niscaya kapherara saphalakama habe na
Ara baluna, ‘he amara raba! Ksama karuna o daya karuna, ara apani'i to sarbasrestha dayalu.’
